memories.name: QA Strategy Planning
memories.episode_body: Focus on expanding E2E test coverage and improving test automation frameworks. Luis is doing well on test automation. Need to hire senior QA engineer for test architecture.

memories.name: Kate Thompson - QA Lead
memories.episode_body: Kate Thompson is QA Lead at TechFlow Solutions, leading the QA Team. Expert in test automation, quality assurance processes, and end-to-end testing strategies. 7 years QA experience. Manages Luis Rodriguez. Ensures quality across all releases.

memories.name: Testing Strategy
memories.episode_body: Multi-layer testing approach: unit tests (pytest for backend, Vitest for frontend), integration tests (API testing), E2E tests (Playwright). Minimum 80% code coverage required. All PRs must pass tests before merge. E2E tests run on every deployment to staging.

memories.name: Checkout Flow Test Plan
memories.episode_body: E2E test scenarios for checkout: happy path (complete purchase), payment failure handling, form validation errors, session persistence, mobile responsive behavior, accessibility compliance. Testing across browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Safari. Mobile testing on iOS and Android.

memories.name: Payment Service Testing Gaps
memories.episode_body: Bob's duplicate charge fix on January 15 had adequate unit tests but we missed E2E testing for Redis failure scenarios. Need to add chaos engineering tests for: Redis unavailable, Redis restart during transaction, network partition between payment service and Redis. Adding these to test suite to prevent production incidents.

memories.name: Saved Payment Methods Testing Scope
memories.episode_body: Testing scope for saved payment methods feature is medium complexity. Need to test: save/retrieve/delete payment method flows, expired card handling and refresh, multiple browsers and devices sync, security verification (no plaintext card data stored). Estimated 4 QA days. Can run in parallel with development using test-driven approach.
